comments.message: Hi Valen, interesting post! Any chance you could find an image to go along with it? Images help grab attention and tell a story with higher impact. You should be able to use the Update Entry button on the right of your post and follow the instructions to add images from there. We know occasionally people have issues uploading images so let us know by hitting the Feedback button at the bottom of most pages of our site if you face any problems. Looking forward to seeing more of your inspiring insights on OpenIDEO. And here's some tips on adding visual goodness to your idea: http://ideo.pn/vis-uals plus more on evolving your thought-starter: http://ideo.pn/oi-evolve

description: The people who live in terrible condition areas doesn't know they should drink clean water and eat healthy good foods or they just couldn't afford it.  We also should donate money or supplies to toes organization who help them get clean water and good foods. The way they eat and drink can change their whole life. It's really important for themselves to know how to live health and get away from disease.
summary: My idea is to open a health care class, because in that way the people who live in the poor terrible condition areas can get a chance to know what is ebola and how to avoid it.
title: Open A Health Care Class
